StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: Leaning against the front counter, you take the moment to catch your breath. This town is a mad house, every corner a death trap, every attractive woman a black widow. With no places to rest, you haven’t had time to stop, otherwise you may find yourself stretched across some foul temptresses rear, acting as bait for the next poor fool. You take in your surroundings, hoping to find something of use to cheer you up. The counter is littered with useless detritus, the till open, but what would be the point in taking the money? A designer sunglasses rack next to you is untouched, the closest pair to you a bright red affair. You pick them up and try them on, posing briefly as the age old idiom comes to mind; “Rose tinted glasses”. You could certainly do with a pair....
StaticSkill.Description: The world can be harsh, its appearance grim and future sights unpleasant to contemplate, especially if you end up on some bimbo's feet or stuck in a set of drawers. What you need are some rose tinted glasses, a sunnier view of pleasant people and the wonderful world. Such spectacles are a wonder indeed, and your victim may even thank you for their new optimistic views.
